original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrayoginī.

original: re zhig dur khrod la sogs phyogs dben par //
analyzed: re zhig dur khrod la sogs phyogs dben par //
translated: First, in a secluded place such as a charnel ground,

original: rnal 'byor pa yis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i //
translated: the yogin should set up the support of Vajrayoginī,

original: rten dgram mchod dam gtor ma la sogs bshams //
analyzed: rten dgram mchod dam gtor ma la sogs bshams //
translated: and arrange the offerings, tormas, and so forth.

original: g-yeng ba'i rgyu spangs bde ba'i stan 'dug ste //
analyzed: g-yeng ba'i rgyu spangs bde ba'i stan 'dug ste //
translated: Having abandoned the causes of distraction, sit on a comfortable seat,

original: sngon 'gro'i cha ga rdzogs byas phyi yi ni //
analyzed: sngon 'gro'i cha ga rdzogs byas phyi yi ni //
translated: and having completed the preliminary activities,

original: snang ba yul la sems gtad de brtan nas //
analyzed: snang ba yul la sems gtad de brtan nas //
translated: stabilize the mind by focusing on the appearances of objects.

original: gnyis pa rang nyid chu skyes rig byed gter //
analyzed: gnyis pa rang nyid chu skyes rig byed gter //
translated: Second, one should visualize oneself as the lotus-born Yoginī,

original: ral ba chen dbus stobs chen pags pa mnan //🔽ri rgyal bya mdog mig gi phyag dang ldan //
analyzed: ral ba chen dbus stobs chen pags pa mnan // ri rgyal bya mdog mig gi phyag dang ldan //
translated: with the great powerful skin pressed down in the middle of the great hair bun,🔽having the hand of the king of birds on the head,

original: gri gug ka p'a la ni ra dzos bkang /🔽rus sbal @216a * //
analyzed: gri gug ka p'a la ni ra dzos bkang / rus sbal @216a * //
translated: holding a flaying knife and a skull-cup filled with blood,🔽sitting on a tortoise,

original: steng bzhugs thod pas mgo lus brgyan //
analyzed: steng bzhugs thod pas mgo lus brgyan //
translated: adorned with a head ornament and bone ornaments,

original: sha rgyas zhal ni cung zad 'dzum pa yi //
analyzed: sha rgyas zhal ni cung zad 'dzum pa yi //
translated: with a slightly smiling face of full flesh,

original: de 'dra'i lha la sems brtan gsum pa ni //
analyzed: de 'dra'i lha la sems brtan gsum pa ni //
translated: The mind is stable in such a deity.🔽

original: sna rtser yungs 'bru tsam gyi lha la dmigs //
analyzed: sna rtser yungs 'bru tsam gyi lha la dmigs //
translated: The third is to focus on a deity the size of a mustard seed at the tip of the nose.

original: de yang rim gyis snang med mkha' lta bu //
analyzed: de yang rim gyis snang med mkha' lta bu //
translated: That also gradually becomes invisible, like space.

original: gsal nas dngos grub rnal 'byor pa yis mthong //
analyzed: gsal nas dngos grub rnal 'byor pa yis mthong //
translated: When it is clear, the adept sees spiritual powers.

original: thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma bzlas pa dang // bsngo ba bya ste ci bder gnas par bya //
analyzed: thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma bzlas pa dang // bsngo ba bya ste ci bder gnas par bya //
translated: Between sessions, make offerings, give tormas, recite, and dedicate, and then rest as long as is comfortable.

original: rngon pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rngon pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so /
translated: The instructions of the hunter are complete.
